blocks.text:
def copy(xs, ys, j, k, n):
    """Copy elements from ys to xs

    Args:
        xs - destination
        ys - source
        j - start index in xs
        k - start index in ys
        n - number of elements to copy
    """
    for i in range(n):
        xs[j+i] = ys[k+i]
